name: Format\VideoFill
description: The object for adding a video background fill to a component.

properties.name: stillURL
properties.description: The URL of the image file to use as a still image when the video is not playing.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: The URL of a video file that can be played using AV Player. HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) is highly recommended (.M3U8). For more information on HLS, refer to the iOS developer documentation on HTTP Live Streaming, especially the following sections of the HTTP Live Streaming Overview:

properties.name: attachment
properties.description: A string that indicates how the fill should behave when a user scrolls.

properties.name: fillMode
properties.description: A string that indicates how the video fill should be displayed.

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: A string that sets the horizontal alignment of the video fill within its component.

properties.name: loop
properties.description: A Boolean value when set to true, specifies that the video will start over again when it reaches the end.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: A string value that sets the vertical alignment of the video fill within its component.
